title: Looking for participants for my research study!
selftext:
Looking for participants for my research study!

​

"Does this hit home?: Exploring the Impact of Introspective Art on Retraumatization" 

Welcome!

I am Urja Gokani, a student of TYBSc (Honors) in Psychology at SVKM's Mithibai College.

Through this study, I aim to understand the impact of introspective art on individuals who have experienced developmental or complex trauma before the age of 18.

Study Details:

\- Purpose: Explore emotional responses and potential retraumatization through introspective art.

\- Participant Criteria: a. Age: 20-30  b. Have experienced developmental or complex trauma.

\- Duration: Approximately 2 hours (virtual sessions).

\- Support: Access to a counseling psychologist during the study.

Definitions:

\- Developmental Trauma: Disruption or impairment of normal psychological and emotional development due to chronic exposure to traumatic events during childhood.

​

\- Complex Trauma: Ongoing exposure to multiple traumatic events, often within interpersonal relationships, leading to significant psychological and emotional impact.

​

\- This study has been reviewed and approved and will be under the guidance of my course professor.

​

In case you wish to participate please fill out this form, it contains all the necessary information regarding the study including the ethical guidelines followed, risks, and benefits. The intent is to conduct this study this week.

​

[https://forms.gle/Vte7QZsM8LmjZutH9](https://forms.gle/Vte7QZsM8LmjZutH9) 

​

Interested or have any questions?

Please contact Urja Gokani at urja.gokani@gmail.com

​

Thank you for considering contributing to this research.
